card.name: Abeyance
card.property: Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Alabaster Dragon
card.property: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Alms
card.property: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves." —Sisay, journal

card.name: Angelic Renewal
card.property: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

card.name: Ardent Militia
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the rest of us got paid to serve the Benalish army, the militia didn't. I used to say they stood for freedom—free and dumb." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Argivian Find
card.property: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We often bury our pasts, and then someone comes along and digs them up." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Aura of Silence
card.property: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Benalish Infantry
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite part of getting into the infantry was getting out again." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Benalish Knight
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We called them 'armored lightning.'" —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Benalish Missionary
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself—right now!"—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Debt of Loyalty
card.property: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I killed him because I had to," Starke lied to Gerrard. "But now I pledge my loyalty to you."

card.name: Duskrider Falcon
card.property: Flying, protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seaborne ships have their dolphins to dance in their wakes; I have my duskriders." —Sisay, journal

card.name: Empyrial Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire." —"Hymn of Angelfire"

card.name: Foriysian Brigade
card.property: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A double-edged sword lets you cut down your enemies with the backswing as well." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
card.property: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fighting without an army is called a duel, and you'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Guided Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can kill your enemy with the first stroke, you save yourself the labor of the second." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Heavy Ballista
card.property: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Archers, ballistae—you can't even get near the island of Avenant." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Inner Sanctum
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Save me from Maraxus," Starke pleaded, "or condemn me to his wrath. Either way, do not ignore me!"

card.name: Kithkin Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to enchanted creature this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Master of Arms
card.property: First strike {1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Being the best usually means proving it to everyone." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Mistmoon Griffin
card.property: Flying When Mistmoon Griffin dies, exile Mistmoon Griffin, then return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Peacekeeper
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}. Creatures can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise." —Sisay, journal

card.name: Revered Unicorn
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Revered Unicorn leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of age counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I felt unworthy even to dream of it." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Serenity
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think of me as the storm before the calm." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Serra's Blessing
card.property: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Soul Shepherd
card.property: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sidar who raised me had a saying: 'The first step into death is the hardest.'" —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Southern Paladin
card.property: {W} {W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look to the south; there you will find peace and serenity." —The Book of Tal

card.name: Tariff
card.property: Each player sacrifices the creature they control with the highest converted mana cost unless they pay that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one.

card.name: Volunteer Reserves
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm always a little leery of anyone who offers to kill other people for free." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Abduction
card.property: Enchant creature When Abduction enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Abjure
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a blue permanent. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri's hackles rose as Ertai continued expounding his virtues. "If that arrogant brat doesn't shut up soon," she growled to herself, "I'm going to have to kill him."

card.name: Ancestral Knowledge
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Ancestral Knowledge enters the battlefield, look at the top ten cards of your library, then exile any number of them and put the rest back on top of your library in any order. When Ancestral Knowledge leaves the battlefield, shuffle your library.

card.name: Apathy
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random. If the player does, untap that creature.

card.name: Argivian Restoration
card.property: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Avizoa
card.property: Flying {0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Maybe we can trap them with bait," thought Tahngarth, eyeing Squee.

card.name: Cloud Djinn
card.property: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As elusive as the footprint of a djinn —Suq'Ata expression

card.name: Disrupt
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oh, I'm sorry—did I break your concentration?

card.name: Ertai's Familiar
card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. {U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.

card.name: Flux
card.property: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every spell has the potential to be worthless." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Fog Elemental
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Mana Chains
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part." —Sisay, journal

card.name: Manta Ray
card.property: Manta Ray can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Manta Ray can't be blocked except by blue creatures. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Manta Ray.

card.name: Merfolk Traders
card.property: When Merfolk Traders enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As much as I hate water, I do love fish . . . ." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Noble Benefactor
card.property: When Noble Benefactor dies, each player may search their library for a card and put that card into their hand. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Ophidian
card.property: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Paradigm Shift
card.property: Exile all cards from your library. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barrin always said that reality is relative. 'The world,' he cautioned, 'is but pieces of one's perception.'"—Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Pendrell Mists
card.property: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.property: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fishtails infest the water, and mists walk the land. Give me simple solid rock any day." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Phantom Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But you said 'when goats fly!'" Squee whined.

card.name: Psychic Vortex
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Draw a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tolaria floats upon a wheel of fortune." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Relearn
card.property: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Sage Owl
card.property: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The owl asks but never answers.

card.name: Teferi's Veil
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?" —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Timid Drake
card.property: Flying When another creature enters the battlefield, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sneezed, and it bolted." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Tolarian Drake
card.property: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many have been lost just in staring at its wings. What's seen differs from account to account, but madness is always part of the story.

card.name: Tolarian Entrancer
card.property: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me—and with music." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Tolarian Serpent
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the fishtails' threats of magic didn't move me, they set their pet on us." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Vodalian Illusionist
card.property: {U} {U}, {T}: Target creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Torahn gore these shifty fishtails! You can't even get close to one."—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
card.property: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Agonizing Memories
card.property: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Barrow Ghoul
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Barrow Ghoul unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They killed my family to deny me a future. They fed on my ancestors to deny me a past." —Crovax

card.name: Bone Dancer
card.property: Whenever Bone Dancer attacks and isn't blocked, you may put the top creature card of defending player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. If you do, Bone Dancer assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Buried Alive
card.property: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it worse to walk while dead, or to be buried alive? I have witnessed both." —Crovax

card.name: Circling Vultures
card.property: Flying You may discard Circling Vultures any time you could cast an instant. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Circling Vultures unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

card.name: Coils of the Medusa
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/-1. Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.

card.name: Doomsday
card.property: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Fatal Blow
card.property: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?" —Crovax

card.name: Festering Evil
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. {B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: It deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Fledgling Djinn
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Gallowbraid
card.property: Trample Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If its skin looks like stone, it is only to match its heart." —Crovax

card.name: Haunting Misery
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Hidden Horror
card.property: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lifespans are measured by its dreadful length.

card.name: Infernal Tribute
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude." —Crovax

card.name: Mischievous Poltergeist
card.property: Flying Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Morinfen
card.property: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there." —Crovax

card.name: Necratog
card.property: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Necratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The necratog can always dig up a meal.

card.name: Odylic Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Whenever Odylic Wraith deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.

card.name: Razortooth Rats
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us." —Crovax

card.name: Shadow Rider
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.

card.name: Shattered Crypt
card.property: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You lose X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the Weatherlight. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept." —Crovax

card.name: Spinning Darkness
card.property: You may exile the top three black cards of your graveyard rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Strands of Night
card.property: {B} {B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams." —Crovax

card.name: Tendrils of Despair
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Because I am incapable of tears does not mean I have no need to shed them." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Urborg Justice
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance." —Crovax

card.name: Urborg Stalker
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a nonblack, nonland permanent, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you be a stalker's dream." —Urborg curse

card.name: Wave of Terror
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your draw step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Wave of Terror. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea of fear has endless depths.

card.name: Zombie Scavengers
card.property: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen." —Crovax

card.name: Aether Flash
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't get there from here. Well, you can—it just won't be fun." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Betrothed of Fire
card.property: Enchant creature Sacrifice an untapped creature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice enchanted creature: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodrock Cyclops
card.property: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here." —Squee, goblin cabin hand, scouting report

card.name: Bogardan Firefiend
card.property: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Boiling Blood
card.property: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your father has no horns!Your mother wears a bell!You drink the milk of goats!—Talruum taunts

card.name: Cinder Giant
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The giant wept tears of embers for the deaths of his allies." —Azeworai, "The Lonely Giant"

card.name: Cinder Wall
card.property: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Easy. All ya gotta do is push somebody into it." —Squee, goblin cabin hand, scouting report

card.name: Cone of Flame
card.property: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mine is not the warmth of compassion." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Desperate Gambit
card.property: Choose a source you control and flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Dwarven Berserker
card.property: Whenever Dwarven Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I may be small, but I can kick your butt."

card.name: Dwarven Thaumaturgist
card.property: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Fervor
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands!"—Maraxus of Keld

card.name: Fire Whip
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target." Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Firestorm
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Firestorm deals X damage to each of X targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glok loved storms! He'd sit an' watch an' laugh through the whole thing. I miss him."—Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Fit of Rage
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Goblin Bomb
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a fuse counter on Goblin Bomb. If you lose the flip, remove a fuse counter from Goblin Bomb. Remove five fuse counters from Goblin Bomb and sacrifice it: It deals 20 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Goblin Grenadiers
card.property: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For once, Squee realized, he wasn't the dumb one.

card.name: Goblin Vandal
card.property: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Heart of Bogardan
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When a player doesn't pay Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep, Heart of Bogardan deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus 2.

card.name: Heat Stroke
card.property: At end of combat, destroy each creature that blocked or was blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stroke of heat or stroke of blade. Choose your fate, traitor." —Maraxus of Keld, to Starke

card.name: Hurloon Shaman
card.property: When Hurloon Shaman dies, each player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe it when they say they're connected to the land—looks like somebody plowed her face." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Lava Hounds
card.property: Haste When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What cats bury, dogs eat. —Urborg aphorism

card.name: Lava Storm
card.property: Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature or Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.

card.name: Maraxus of Keld
card.property: Maraxus of Keld's power and toughness are each equal to the number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have no master. I am chaos." —Maraxus of Keld

card.name: Orcish Settlers

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They wouldn't know their house from a charred hole in the ground.

card.name: Roc Hatchling
card.property: Roc Hatchling enters the battlefield with four shell counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling. As long as Roc Hatchling has no shell counters on it, it gets +3/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Sawtooth Ogre
card.property: Whenever Sawtooth Ogre blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.property: Choose one — • Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Thundermare
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hooves strike lightning and the thunder follows quickly after.

card.name: Aboroth
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight banked sharply as the colossal beast rose up to crush the lone rider. "My bet's on the dirt," Gerrard said flatly.

card.name: Arctic Wolves
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Arctic Wolves enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter where we cat warriors go in the world, those stupid slobberers find us." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Barishi
card.property: When Barishi dies, exile Barishi, then shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Blossoming Wreath
card.property: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I place this wreath for you, my kin. Even in death, you give me strength to avenge you." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Briar Shield
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In all its forms, the forest is the elves' best protector.

card.name: Call of the Wild

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thinking of dinner made Squee realize that the forest was probably thinking the same thing.

card.name: Choking Vines
card.property: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step. X target attacking creatures become blocked. Choking Vines deals 1 damage to each of those creatures. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)

card.name: Dense Foliage
card.property: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too." —Squee, goblin cabin hand

card.name: Downdraft
card.property: {G}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. Sacrifice Downdraft: It deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Fallow Wurm
card.property: When Fallow Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wurm's wake —Elvish expression meaning "ruined crops"

card.name: Familiar Ground
card.property: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather fight on foreign soil. That way, if I lose I can blame it on the terrain." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Fungus Elemental
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Activate this ability only if Fungus Elemental entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I rot growth and grow rot. What am I? —Elvish riddle

card.name: Gaea's Blessing
card.property: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Harvest Wurm
card.property: When Harvest Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wurm's weave —Elvish expression meaning "plowed fields"

card.name: Liege of the Hollows
card.property: When Liege of the Hollows dies, each player may pay any amount of mana. Then each player creates a number of 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens equal to the amount of mana they paid this way.

card.name: Llanowar Behemoth
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Llanowar Druid
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Llanowar Druid: Untap all Forests.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This forest means more to the druids than their own kin. The loss of a tree is like the loss of a child." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Llanowar Sentinel
card.property: When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest has as many eyes as leaves." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Mwonvuli Ooze
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay {2} for each age counter on it.) Mwonvuli Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus twice the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Nature's Kiss
card.property: Enchant creature {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I cradle my rage even as the earth cradles my dead kin." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Nature's Resurgence
card.property: Each player draws a card for each creature card in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring follows winter —Elvish expression meaning "all things pass"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the heart of Llanowar the magic is so strong that trees cannot stay rooted." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Rogue Elephant
card.property: When Rogue Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When are trees like grass?" —The One Thousand Questions

card.name: Striped Bears
card.property: When Striped Bears enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bear is never cautious—which is why it wasn't born a human." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Sylvan Hierophant
card.property: When Sylvan Hierophant dies, exile Sylvan Hierophant, then return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tranquil Grove

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the fiercest storm has a peaceful eye." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Uktabi Efreet
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Uktabi efreet and I have something in common: both of our mothers wanted to give us back." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Veteran Explorer
card.property: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Vitalize
card.property: Untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Bubble Matrix
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This device was commisioned by a king who desired peace. Unfortunately, the royal artificer was also the king's jester." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Bösium Strip
card.property: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from the top of your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Chimeric Sphere
card.property: {2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 2/1 Construct artifact creature with flying. {2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 3/2 Construct artifact creature and loses flying.

card.name: Dingus Staff
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, Dingus Staff deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A sharp conscience is the weapon of the soul." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Jabari's Banner
card.property: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains flanking until end of turn. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Jangling Automaton
card.property: Whenever Jangling Automaton attacks, untap all creatures defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We always look upon our first creations as masterpieces, no matter how awful they are." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Mana Web
card.property: Whenever a land an opponent controls is tapped for mana, tap all lands that player controls that could produce any type of mana that land could produce.

card.name: Mind Stone
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

card.name: Null Rod
card.property: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard: "But it doesn't do anything!" Hanna: "No—it does nothing."

card.name: Phyrexian Furnace
card.property: {T}: Exile the bottom card of target player's graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Serrated Biskelion
card.property: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Steel Golem
card.property: You can't cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although I would give my life to protect Gerrard, my conscience will not let me take another's. There are many who would not hesitate." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Straw Golem
card.property: When an opponent casts a creature spell, sacrifice Straw Golem.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look at me. I didn't build it." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Thran Forge
card.property: {2}: Until end of turn, target nonartifact creature gets +1/+0 and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This will work," Gerrard called to the elves as he used the forge to strengthen the aboroth, "but if it doesn't, we won't survive to care."

card.name: Thran Tome
card.property: {5}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent chooses one of those cards. Put that card into your graveyard, then draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every line holds a tale, and between lie a thousand more.

card.name: Touchstone
card.property: {T}: Tap target artifact you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One touch to the stone and the sidar's son turned me from stalwart to statue." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Well of Knowledge
card.property: {2}: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability but only during their draw step.

card.name: Xanthic Statue
card.property: {5}: Until end of turn, Xanthic Statue becomes an 8/8 Golem artifact creature with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until you have lived as a statue, do not talk to me of pigeons." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Gemstone Mine
card.property: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

card.name: Lotus Vale
card.property: If Lotus Vale would enter the battlefield, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Lotus Vale onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

card.name: Scorched Ruins
card.property: If Scorched Ruins would enter the battlefield, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Scorched Ruins onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}.

card.name: Winding Canyons
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: You may cast creature spells this turn as though they had flash.
